channel.title: NPC's No-clip? [Delta]
channel.description:
When i attack NPC's on my server, my player will no-clip though walls and objects to reach that NPC, also if i attack an NPC and then run away, while the NPC is following me they no-clip through any walls and objects.
I've been told that i need to add some sort of "pathfinder" to fix this error, but no-clipping only happens for me when i attack NPC's. When i'm just walking somewhere, or i try to use an object that's in a place i can't reach, my player never no-clips. Doesn't this mean there has to be some sort of anti no-clip thing somewhere in my source? and that it's just not being applied for some reason when i attack NPC's?
If anyone understands my problem any help would really be appreciated :)

item.title: NPC's No-clip? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Carnifex12 Carnifex12
item.description:
@Carnifex12 wrote:

When i attack NPC’s on my server, my player will no-clip though walls and objects to reach that NPC, also if i attack an NPC and then run away, while the NPC is following me they no-clip through any walls and objects.

I’ve been told that i need to add some sort of “pathfinder” to fix this error, but no-clipping only happens for me when i attack NPC’s. When i’m just walking somewhere, or i try to use an object that’s in a place i can’t reach, my player never no-clips. Doesn’t this mean there has to be some sort of anti no-clip thing somewhere in my source? and that it’s just not being applied for some reason when i attack NPC’s?

If anyone understands my problem any help would really be appreciated
